data.text:
Ethiopian Airlines, the first African carrier to receive IATA’s CEIV Pharma certification, is proud to have transported close to 400 Million doses of COVID 19 vaccines to over 35 countries across the Globe. 

#EthiopianCargo #Cargowithcare #Ethiopianpharmawing https://t.co/2WUK6eZNdZ

Enjoy enhanced travel experience through combined comfort and safety at Addis Ababa's Bole International new passenger terminal.
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/SsHyEmlVYP
